sentences.english: Above grilled items are served with baked potato or French fries and vegetables of the day.
sentences.chinese: 以上各式烤肉配烤土豆或炸薯條和每日時蔬。

sentences.english: Served with Chinese daily soup, seasonal vegetable, fruit and green tea.
sentences.chinese: 本幫糖醋排骨飯配以中式老火湯，時蔬，水果及綠茶。

sentences.english: Australian beef tenderloin, truffle mashed potato, roasted vegetables, red wine sauce.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲牛裏脊，松露土豆泥，烤時蔬，紅酒汁。

sentences.english: Roasted vegetables, mash potatoes, French fries.
Chop green vegetable steamed rice, Tomato and egg soup.
sentences.chinese: 排骨時蔬蒸飯，西紅柿蛋湯，蘋果。

sentences.english: Grilled Lobster, Octopus, king Prawn, Scollops with Roasted Potato, Vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 炙烤龍蝦，章魚須，大蝦，澳帶配烤土豆和時蔬。

sentences.english: It is best for people's health to eat local vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 食用當地時蔬對人體健康最有利。

sentences.english: With Shredded Chicken, Fresh Prawn, vegetables.
Or, I put on the plant vegetable directly from the garden to the plate.
sentences.chinese: 或者，我直接把園裏的時蔬放到盤子裏。

definition: katsuobushi or dried bonito flakes (paper-thin shavings of preserved skipjack tuna)
fish maw/a food dish made from the swim bladder of fish
Cantonese poached chicken, known as "white cut chicken"
Chinese broccoli/Chinese kale/cabbage mustard/Brassica oleracea var. alboglabra/also pr. [jie4 lan2]
